functions-question3_key2: Yeh question 2 parts mein hai. Dono parts ka `code` same `file` mein likh ke submit karein.
functions-question3_key4: `add_numbers` naam ka function likhiye jo do numbers ko arguments ke tarah le aur fir unka sum print karta hai. Arguments ka naam `number1` aur `number2` hona chaiye.
functions-question3_key8: `add_numbers_list` naam ka function likhiye jo do `integers` ki 2 lists leta ho aur fir same position wale `integers` ka sum print karta ho.
functions-question3_key9: Same position waale 2 `integers` ka sum karne ke liye Part 1 mein di gayi add_numbers waale function ka use karo.
functions-question3_key10: Jaise agar hum iss function ko [50, 60, 10] aur [10, 20, 13] denge ko woh yeh print karega
